# Front Matter

# title

  • Type: string
  • Default: undefined
  • Required: true

The title for the page and content.

e.g.

---
title: Hello World
---
1
2
3

# tags

  • Type: string|string[]
  • Default: undefined
  • Required: false

The key to classifier pages and will also be displayed in the post:

e.g.

---
tags: 
  - JavaScript
  - DOM
---
1
2
3
4
5

# date

  • Type: YYYY-MM-DD
  • Default: undefined
  • Required: false

Our recommended format is YYYY-MM-DD, but it actually accepts multi formats. VuePress is using js-yaml which follows standard yaml types, so you can find all available formats hereopen in new window.

Date for the post. This will be used for permalink, sorting and displayed in the layout:

e.g.

---
date: 2016-10-20
---
1
2
3

# author

  • Type: string
  • Default: undefined
  • Required: false

Author for the post. This will be displayed in the post:

e.g.

---
author: ULIVZ
---
1
2
3

# location

  • Type: string
  • Default: undefined
  • Required: false

Location for the post. This will be displayed in the post:

e.g.

---
location: Hangzhou
---
1
2
3

# summary

  • Type: string
  • Default: undefined
  • Required: false

Summary for the post. This will be displayed in the post:

e.g.

---
summary: Here's a quick post on what I found.
---
1
2
3
